Description: Snuff-bottle. Flowers and inscription. Made of turquoise enamelled ceramic, porcelain.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Rev J W Neligan
Bibliographic references: Franks 1879 / Catalogue of a Collection of Oriental Porcelain and Pottery (p. 138) (Even though the catalogue states "Franks 911", this entry in fact refers to 911a (see also General Notes of record Franks 911))
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
